name: products
description: Entity definition for managing catalog products, prices, and stock thresholds.
columns:
name,string,no
sku,string,yes
unit,string,no
category_id,string,yes
purchase_price,decimal,no
sale_price,decimal,no
stock,decimal,no
min_stock,decimal,no

name: warehouses
description: Entity definition describing warehouse locations and managers.

name: inventory_transactions
description: Entity definition tracking product movements per warehouse, including reference metadata.
columns:
product_id,bigInteger,no
warehouse_id,bigInteger,no
type,string,no
quantity,decimal,no
reference_type,string,no
reference_id,bigInteger,no
note,text,yes
